member.name: T:TestingTools.AutoLoadGame
member.summary: Addon that automatically loads a save when the game starts

member.name: P:TestingTools.AutoLoadGame.Game
member.summary: Name of the game to load.

member.name: P:TestingTools.AutoLoadGame.Save
member.summary: Name of the save file to load.

member.name: P:TestingTools.AutoLoadGame.Loaded
member.summary: Whether the game has been loaded.

member.name: T:TestingTools.AutoSwitchVessel
member.summary: Addon that automatically switches to a vessel when a save is loaded

members.member: * The following is taken and adapted from the HyperEdit plugin licensed under the GPL, Copyright Erickson Swift, 2013. * As of writing, supported by Team HyperEdit, and Ezriilc. * Original HyperEdit concept and code by khyperia (no longer involved).

member.name: P:TestingTools.TestingTools.CurrentSave
member.summary: Get the name of the current save game.

member.name: M:TestingTools.TestingTools.RemoveOtherVessels
member.summary: Remove all vessels except the active vessel.

member.name: M:TestingTools.TestingTools.SetCircularOrbit(System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Set the orbit of the active vessel to a circular orbit.
member.param: Altitude to orbit at, in meters above MSL.

member.name: M:TestingTools.TestingTools.SetOrbit(System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Set the orbit of the active vessel.

member.name: M:TestingTools.TestingTools.ClearRotation(KRPC.SpaceCenter.Services.Vessel)
member.summary: Clear the rotational velocity of the given vessel.

member.name: M:TestingTools.TestingTools.ApplyRotation(System.Single,KRPC.Utils.Tuple{System.Single,System.Single,System.Single},KRPC.SpaceCenter.Services.Vessel)
member.summary: Apply a rotation to the given vessel.
